@RequestMapping(path="/api/assets")

      • create

        @PostMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<com.co.intrasoft.responses.Response<com.co.intrasoft.documents.Asset>> create​(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                                                             @Valid com.co.intrasoft.documents.Asset asset,
                                                                                                                             org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        Method to make a POST request to save data in storage

        When an error happens it shows its default message, and here validate the Dates and the states of the assignment

        Parameters:
        asset - Data to be saved.
        result - Argument to validate method.
        Returns:
        Return a confirmation or an error message

      • update

        @PatchMapping(path="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<com.co.intrasoft.responses.Response<com.co.intrasoft.documents.Asset>> update​(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                             java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                             @Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                                                             @Valid com.co.intrasoft.documents.Asset asset,
                                                                                                                             org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        Method to make a PATCH request to update an object in storage

        Validates if there is an error and show its default message

        Parameters:
        id - ID of the object to update.
        asset - Object to update.
        result - Argument to validate method.
        Returns:
        Return a confirmation or an error message
